name: Triangularity
description:
A game where you're a triangular ship that defeats bad guys to earn money to even get stronger for the incoming ruthless TIME 1000.

Want Variation in stats and skills? well go to the shop to buy melee dmg to be a fearful hitting foe. or be high in bullet dmg and bulllet speed to be a deadly sniper. there are a lot of variations and many things you can buy in the shop. some easter eggs are in the game too.

game is bad since I developed it and I'm new to unity EEEEE.
